Title: WP7Localization
Description:
This is a sample WP7 project that shows how to use localization. The app only implements english and spanish resources for this sample.

Localization implemented includes

Control Text e.g. TextBlock's Text properties 
Application Bar & Menu Items (example implements ApplicationBarMenuItem localization) 
Applicaiton Title Localisation
HomeWiki:
Project Description
This is a sample WP7 project that shows how to use localization. The app only implements english and spanish resources for this sample.

Localization implemented includes

  • Control Text e.g. TextBlock's Text properties
  • Application Bar & Menu Items (example implements ApplicationBarMenuItem localization)
  • Applicaiton Title Localisation
